Package util

Class RandomLetters

java.lang.Object
util.RandomLetters
public class RandomLetters
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
Rogelio this function creates an array of random characters to use there are always at least 3 vowels created with the remaining amount of letters.txt being the available consonants

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.lang.String letterGetter​(int amount)
    This creates a character array of the legal letters.txt that can be used in the word game 3 consonants are randomly decided and the rest of the characters are consonants
    static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Character> letterShuffler​(char[] letters)
    This takes in a character array of letters.txt and shuffles it

  • Method Details

    • letterGetter

      public static java.lang.String letterGetter​(int amount)
      This creates a character array of the legal letters.txt that can be used in the word game 3 consonants are randomly decided and the rest of the characters are consonants
      Parameters:
      amount - - the total amount of characters to be used
      Returns:
      - character array of legal characters

    • letterShuffler

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Character> letterShuffler​(char[] letters)
      This takes in a character array of letters.txt and shuffles it
      Parameters:
      letters - - input character array
      Returns:
      - arrayList of shuffled letters.txt
